entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 p.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 12:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain in the morning. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
